text: Robin Froidevaux (born 17 October 1998) is a Swiss road and track cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team . ==Major results== ===Track=== ;2015 : 2nd Team pursuit, UCI Junior World Track Championships ;2016 : 1st 20px Omnium, National Junior Track Championships ;2017 : 2nd Madison, National Track Championships : 3rd Team pursuit, 2017–18 UCI Track Cycling World Cup – Milton ;2018 : 2nd Team pursuit, UEC European Under-23 Track Championships : 2nd Omnium, National Track Championships ;2019 : European Games ::1st Madison ::3rd Team pursuit : 1st 20px Omnium, National Track Championships : UEC European Under-23 Track Championships ::3rd Madison ::3rd Team pursuit ;2020 : 2nd 15px Mixed team relay, UEC European Road Championships ===Road=== ;2015 : 3rd Time trial, National Junior Road Championships ;2016 : 2nd E3 Harelbeke Juniors : 9th Road race, UEC European Junior Road Championships ;2018 : 2nd Road race, National Under-23 Road Championships ;2019 : 1st Stage 2 (TTT) Tour de l'Avenir : 8th Road race, UEC European Under-23 Road Championships : 8th Road race, European Games : 10th Overall Tour du Jura ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Morges Category:Swiss male cyclists Category:Swiss track cyclists Category:European Games competitors for Switzerland Category:Cyclists at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games medalists in cycling Category:European Games gold medalists for Switzerland Category:European Games bronze medalists for Switzerland
title: Robin Froidevaux
